mapper.sql: USER_ID, TB__PERSONNEL_ID, PERSONNEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select:
select t1.role_id, t1.role_name from tb_roles t1, tb_user_role t2 1 = 1 and t1.status_cd = 1000 and t2.status_cd = 1000 and t1.role_id = t2.role_id
and t2.user_id = #{userId}

select t1.personnel_id, t1.psn_name, t1.psn_nbr, t1.psn_code, t2.content mobile_phone, t3.content email, t4.cert_type, t4.cert_no from tb_personnel t1 left join tb_contact t2 on t1.personnel_id = t2.personnel_id and t1.status_cd = t2.status_cd and t2.contact_type = '1' and t2.first_flag = '1' left join tb_contact t3 on t1.personnel_id = t3.personnel_id and t1.status_cd = t3.status_cd and t3.contact_type = '2' and t3.first_flag = '1' left join tb_cert t4 on t1.personnel_id = t4.personnel_id and t1.status_cd = t4.status_cd where t1.status_cd = 1000
and t1.personnel_id = #{personnelId}

select t1.org_id, t1.org_name, t1.full_name, t2.acct_org_rel_id from tb_org t1, tb_account_org_rel t2, tb_acct t3 where t1.status_cd = 1000 and t2.status_cd = 1000 and t1.org_id = t2.org_id and t2.acct_id = t3.acct_id
and t3.personnel_id = #{personnelId}
